description: The Java language has crossed it's 20th anniversary and with it comes an incredible range of tools libraries to choose from; sometimes there are too many choices for the same task. In this talk we'll cover those libraries that have risen to the top by proving themselves to be worthy of a place in every developer's toolbox, both for production and testing code. We'll also cover some fairly new libraries that are bound to make a big impact in the ecosystem.

title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Andres Almiray - Java libraries you can't afford to miss
